choiceresponse.label: If you decide to disable the top and bottom navigation, when might you need to update the code that does this?

checkboxgroup.choice: When edX changes the classes in their HTML
When edX changes their navigation scheme
When you update your own navigation scheme

div.p: Altering edX's built-in classes is a great example of a "fragile change." EdX has altered its layout and CSS in the past, and will no doubt continue to do so in the future, possibly without advance warning. While some classes are likely to be quite stable (such as the "sr" class used for screen-reader-only content), there's no guarantee.
